CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 5, 1963, pg. 16 reads: "Social Studies - Belmar School sixth graders recently heard a discussion on "Three Faiths - Judaism, Christianity, Moslem," as part of their social studies course. Speakers included (extreme right, left to right) the Rev. LeRoy Patrick, pastor of Bethesda Presbyterian Church; Miss Myriam Joseph and Miss Lorraine Modrak, both Belmar teachers.  The class is tutored by Mrs. Mary Agnes Dailey. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lorraine Modrak, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Myriam Joseph, lighting Menorah, speaking to sixth grade classroom of boys and girls in Belmar School, another version
